Name: Cuisinart Triple-Riveted Forged 8-Inch Chef's Knife with Stainless Steel Endcap
contro:
Food professionals did not find it easy to use
  • Poor at slicing and chopping onions, cutting basil into thin ribbons, slicing tomatoes and steak, mincing parsley, and cutting up a whole chicken
pro:
Consumer testers found it comfortable to hold and easy to use
  • Excellent at slicing cheese
